PPRInterface

@objc
public class PPRInterface : NSObject, UAPPProtocol

This public class is entry point for Product Registration. All required properties need to be initialized at the time of launch.

Since

1.0.0
  • instantiateViewController(_:withErrorHandler:)

    Documenting UAPPProtocol

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @available(iOS 2.0, *)
@objc
public func instantiateViewController(_ launchInput: UAPPLaunchInput, withErrorHandler completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)? = nil) -> UIViewController?

    Parameters

    launchInput

    Instance of UAPPLaunchInput class for setting the parameters needed for launch of UAPP
    completionHandler

    Block for handling error

    Return Value

    Returns an instance of UApp’s UIViewController which will be used for launching the UApp

  • init(dependencies:andSettings:)

    Called when Product Registration module is invoked.

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
required public init(dependencies: UAPPDependencies, andSettings settings: UAPPSettings?)

    Parameters

    dependencies

    Object of UAppDependencies class for injecting Dependencies needed by UApp
    settings

    Object of UAPPSettings class for injecting one time initialisation parameters needed for UAPP initialisation
